content:
FileNotFoundError: [WinError 2] The system cannot find the file specified
>>> import os
>>> import subprocess
>>>
>>> # Manually update Python's PATH
>>> os.environ["PATH"] += os.pathsep + r"C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Cloud SDK\google-cloud-sdk\bin"
>>>
>>> try:
...     output = subprocess.run(["gcloud", "--version"], check=True, capture_output=True, text=True, env=os.environ)
...     print("✅ gcloud is working inside Python!", output.stdout)
... except FileNotFoundError:
...     print("❌ gcloud is still NOT found in Python.")
...
❌ gcloud is still NOT found in Python.
>>>
